name: Encord
headline: The data development platform for AI teams
description:
Encord is the leading data development platform for advanced vision and multimodal AI teams. We build tools and infrastructure to help the world's leading AI teams get their models into production faster - with data-centric model testing, human-centric workflow and annotation tools for labeling & RLHF, and data curation and management software. 

Encord is trusted by pioneering AI teams at Stanford Medicine, Mass General Brigham, Tractable, Viz AI, Iterative Health, the UHN, the Royal Navy, Veo, and many more global companies.

founders.name: Eric Landau, Founder
founders.description:
Senior Quantitative Researcher | DRW 
SM Applied Physics | Harvard University
MS Electrical Engineering, BS Physics  |  Stanford University

![stats](https://encord.com/static/heroKusamaVector-6d0d5eeab814e32246e1f225b9241ae2.svg)[NewðŸš¨ E-book Launch | The Rise of Intelligent Machines](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/industry/robotics/>)
The fastest way to**manage, curate and annotate** AI data
Manage, curate, and label multimodal data such as image, video, audio, document, text and DICOM files â€“ all on one platform. Transform petabytes of unstructured data into high quality data for training, fine-tuning, and aligning AI models, fast.
Get started
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='346'%20width='534'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='342'%20width='502'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

[![vermeer-section-icon 1 ](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZzDk4K8jQArT0qXg_productIcons.svg?fit=max)Manage & curate![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1200'%20width='1312'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](https://encord.com)![vermeer-section-image1 ](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZzTYEK8jQArT01Pn_datacurationcardasset.avif?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=1312&h=1200)](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/encord-index>)[![vermeer-section-icon 2 ](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZzHMFK8jQArT0rAe_productIcons.svg?fit=max)Annotate & review![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1200'%20width='1312'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](https://encord.com)![vermeer-section-image2 ](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZzHMta8jQArT0rA7_Frame1000003957.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=1312&h=1200)](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/annotate/>)[![vermeer-section-icon 3 ](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZzHSS68jQArT0rE2_productIcons.svg?fit=max)Evaluate & monitor![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1200'%20width='1312'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](https://encord.com)![vermeer-section-image3 ](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZzHSaa8jQArT0rE__Frame1000003243.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=1312&h=1200)](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/active/>)
# Why Encord?
Join thousands of ML practitioners deploying production-ready AI applications using best-in-class data curation, labeling, and model evaluation tools with Encord.
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='48'%20width='228'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Automotus](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrttpEaF0TcGI5c5_Frame1-test%404x.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=228&h=48)
**20%** increase in mAP with intelligent data curation.
[Read Automotus's story](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/customers/automotus-customer-story/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='59'%20width='257'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![CONXAI](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZrtsKkaF0TcGI5cG_conxai2-casestudy.svg?fit=max&w=257&h=59)
**60%** increase in labeling speed by simplifying data pipelines.
[Read Conxaiâ€™s story](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/blog/conxai-case-study/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='76'%20width='207'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![VIDA](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZrtsM0aF0TcGI5cI_VIDAlogo-casestudy.svg?fit=max&w=207&h=76)
**83%** reduction in false positive rate with specialised data management.
[Read Vidaâ€™s story](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/customers/vida-id-customer-story/>)
![Support Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONpkaF0TcGIwUZ_HoveredFileImage.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Support for all key modalities
Visually inspect data outliers with embedding plots. Find underrepresented areas of your datasets and fill these gaps.
![Collaborate Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONqEaF0TcGIwUb_HoveredFork.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Simplify data cleansing
Build balanced and representative datasets by identifying underrepresented visual quality metrics and corrupt images to enhance AI model performance.
![Filter Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONp0aF0TcGIwUa_HoveredFilter.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Advanced filtering options
Connect to AWS, GCP, Azure, or OTC cloud storage in a few clicks and access all nested files in an instant. Data changes in storage are instantly reflected in Encord Index with data refresh.
![Annotate](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/22e23242-2246-4e86-92a8-be555643865d_productIcons+%281%29.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max)
Label your data at scale with Annotate
[Explore Annotate](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/annotate/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1542'%20width='3032'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://encord.com)![ai-assistant-label](https://images.prismic.io/encord/Z2Kx5ZbqstJ98olg_sectionPollock.webp?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3032&h=1542)
Best in-class labeling tools to create high-quality training data
Accelerate your labeling projects at scale. Leverage custom or state-of-the-art foundational models to create pixel-perfect masks in a single click and dramatically reduce labeling hours on datasets. 
[Explore Annotate](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/annotate/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='2000'%20width='2000'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://encord.com)![customizable workflows](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrnTiUaF0TcGI2tu_customizable-workflows.avif?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=2000&h=2000)
Ensure reliable quality assurance with customizable workflows
Integrate humans-in-the-loop seamlessly with fully customizable workflows and expert review to suit your project's needs.
[Explore Annotate](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/annotate/>)
![multimodal icon - active](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZrohsUaF0TcGI3cv_multimodal-active.svg?fit=max)
Multimodal annotation
Efficiently label data of any modality including image, video, medical imagery, or geospatial data and audio. Map relationships between modalities with sophisticated labeling ontologies. 
![streamline icon - active](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/Zrohs0aF0TcGI3cx_streamline-active.svg?fit=max)
Streamline data operations
Monitor team and annotator performance with actionable dashboards to ensure training data quality.
![Collaborate Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONqEaF0TcGIwUb_HoveredFork.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Collaborate across teams
Seamlessly control user roles with permissioning, manage task assignment, and infinitely scale your MLOps workflows.
![Support Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONpkaF0TcGIwUZ_HoveredFileImage.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Find & fix data issues with ease
Identify edge cases and underrepresented classes and conduct robustness and regression tests to uncover failure modes and issues in your models.
![Collaborate Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONqEaF0TcGIwUb_HoveredFork.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Evaluate model performance
Deconstruct model performance with automatic reporting on metrics like mAP, mAR, and F1 Score.
![Filter Active](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZrONp0aF0TcGIwUa_HoveredFilter.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max)
Compare model performance
Integrate humans-in-the-loop to build active learning workflows to refine model performance iteratively, significantly reducing deployment timelines.
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='2000'%20width='2000'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://encord.com)![Integration Asset](https://images.prismic.io/encord/ZoZsdh5LeNNTwyQv_Integration%404x.avif?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=2000&h=2000)
Integrations
Integrate with your toolstack
Connect your secure cloud storage, MLOps tools, and much more with dedicated integrations that slot seamlessly into your workflows.
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='134'%20width='281'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://encord.com)![Security](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZrHcMkaF0TcGItKd_security.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=281&h=134)
security
Built with security in mind
Encord is SOC2, HIPAA, and GDPR compliant with robust security and encryption standards.
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='270'%20width='297'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://encord.com)![API/sdk](https://encord.cdn.prismic.io/encord/ZrHJfUaF0TcGItA6_API%3ASDK.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=297&h=270)
API/sdk
Programmatic access for developers
Leverage our API/SDK to programatically access projects, datasets & labels within the platform via API.

generated_description:
Encord is a London-based company founded in 2021, and itâ€™s making waves in the AI landscape as a premier data development platform specifically tailored for advanced vision and multimodal AI teams. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Encord is laser-focused on helping organizations bring their AI models into production quickly and efficiently. Their mission? To provide a suite of tools for data-centric model testing, human-centric workflows, and robust data management.

The platform streamlines data management, curation, and annotation across various modalitiesâ€”think images, videos, texts, and medical files like DICOM. This allows users to transform massive volumes of unstructured data into high-quality training datasets, supporting the fine-tuning and alignment of AI models. Whether you're a researcher at Stanford Medicine or an AI innovator at Tractable, Encord's solutions are already trusted by industry leaders.

Encord's skilled team of 70 employees is led by Nicolas Dessaigne, a Group Partner who brings valuable expertise to the operation. The company's pricing models are designed for accessibility, inviting potential users to explore [book a demo](https://encord.com/<https:/encord.com/try-it-free/>) and experience the platform's capabilities first-hand.

Their platform's features include advanced capabilities like customizable workflows, multimodal annotations, API access for developers, and strict adherence to security standards like SOC2, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance. Encord not only aims to simplify the process of managing and annotating data but also provides extensive resources for users, including e-books, blogs, and case studies showcasing significant improvements in tagging speeds and reduction in false positives for its clients.

If youâ€™re curious about Encord, take a peek at their website at [encord.com](https://encord.com). With tools that promise efficiency and reliability in AI data operations, Encord is carving out a significant niche in the fast-evolving AI arena.
